Introduction
This topic contains information on cases in which more than one person files a claim as surviving spouse, including
determining that no other claimant is entitled
when more than one person files a claim as a surviving spouse
example 1 of multiple claimants to benefits exist
, and
example 2 of multiple claimants to benefits exist
.
title: M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section D - Establishing Marital Relationship in Survivors Cases
citation: Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section D
